KG

Korean: 케이지

St. Louis, Missouri

Height:
5'1" (155 cm)
Group (2023-present):
VCHA until Dec 7, 2024

Introduction

KG, also known as KG Crown or Kiera Grace is an American singer under JYP Entertainment. She is a former member of the girl group VCHA formed by the survival show "A2K" under JYP Entertainment. She debuted in VCHA on January 26, 2024, with their first single album 'Girls of the Year".

On December 7th, KG officially terminated her contract with JYP Entertainment and departed from VCHA.
